faq.title: Questions everyone
faq.subtitle: All the answers to reassure you and help you make the best decision for your business. Our team is here for your success.

items.question: Does it really work to increase sales?
items.answer: Yes! Over 500 businesses have already multiplied their sales. Proof: our customers recover on average 40% of lost customers and increase their revenue by 35% in the first 2 months. Automatic follow-ups alone generate on average 15-25% additional sales.

items.question: Is it complicated to use? I'm not technical...
items.answer: Not at all! If you know how to send a WhatsApp message, you know how to use Bizuri. 3-click setup, interface as simple as your smartphone. And if you ever get stuck, our team trains you for free via video.

items.question: Will my customers really receive the messages?
items.answer: Absolutely! Your messages arrive directly on WhatsApp and Telegram that your customers already use 20 times a day. No app to download, no registration. Reading rate: 98% (vs 20% for emails).

items.question: How long to see the first results?
items.answer: From your first campaign! Some customers see their sales increase the same day. On average, our users recover their investment in the first 15 days and see consistent growth month after month.

items.question: What if I'm not satisfied? Are there guarantees?
items.answer: You can cancel anytime, no commitment. Your data remains yours and you can export it. If after 30 days you're not satisfied, we'll refund you completely. We're convinced you'll love the results.

items.question: Is my customer data secure?
items.answer: Maximum security guaranteed! Banking-grade SSL encryption, secure servers in Europe, full GDPR compliance. Your data is 100% yours, we NEVER share it. You control everything and can delete everything whenever you want.

items.question: What type of business does it work for exactly?
items.answer: All B2B businesses! Supermarkets, fashion stores, pharmacies, restaurants, electronics stores, groceries, bazaars... Over 500 different types of businesses already use Bizuri successfully throughout Africa.

items.question: Is there really support if I need help?
items.answer: Complete support guaranteed! Free training in English, complete documentation, chat support (Premium) or responsive email. Our Africa-based team perfectly understands your business challenges and supports you to success.
